TWENTY_API_KEY.description: Required to send requests to Twenty

TWENTY_API_URL.description: Optional, defaults to cloud API URL

MAILCHIMP_API_KEY.description: Required to send requests to Mailchimp

MAILCHIMP_URL.description: Required to send requests to Mailchimp

IS_EMAIL_CONSTRAINT.description: Set to true if you want to add additional constraint (default is false)

IS_PHONE_CONSTRAINT.description: Set to true if you want to add additional constraint (default is false)

IS_COMPANY_CONSTRAINT.description: Set to true if you want to add additional constraint (default is false)

IS_ADDRESS_CONSTRAINT.description: Set to true if you want to add additional constraint (default is false)

UPDATE_PERSON.description: Set to true if you want to update record if it exists

MAILCHIMP_AUDIENCE_ID.description: Required to send requests to Mailchimp
